channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Minnesota Lawmakers and Police Seek Complete Ban on Crypto ATMs
item.description: So called "pig butchering" scams are happening on an industrial scale. Politicians have noticed.

item.title: Watch Marlon Wayans React to His ‘Scary Movie 6’ Trailer
item.description: Wayans gives you a little bootlegged sneak peek at what you'll laugh at (and probably feel bad about laughing at) in 'Scary Movie 6.'

item.title: I smell a RAT — new Android malware can hack every top phone maker's security, and costs less than a second-hand iPhone
item.description: Oblivion is an Android RAT which bypasses permissions, intercepts messages, and enables hidden remote control across devices from Samsung, Xiaomi, and OPPO.

item.title: The Rubin Observatory’s alert system sent 800,000 pings on its first night
item.description: The Vera C. Rubin Observatory's automated alert system is online and already bombarding astronomers with things to look at in the night sky. The system went live publicly on Tuesday, February 24th, and on the first night dropped some 800,000 alerts about asteroids, supernovas, and feasting black holes. And that number is only expected to […]

item.title: Sam Altman Is Marketing OpenAI as America’s Wartime AI Company Whether He Intends to or Not
item.description: At the outbreak of a new war, Altman is closer than ever to the Pentagon.

item.title: How to watch the Brit Awards 2026 online for free
item.description: How to watch Brits for free. Live stream the Brit Awards 2026 for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Everything announced at MWC 2026: The new Leica Leitzphone by Xiaomi, Honor's ultra-thin MagicPad 4 and more
item.description: MWC 2026 officially gets underway on March 2 and will continue through March 5, but the announcements are already coming ahead of its start. We can always count on the annual tech event to bring tons of new phones, laptops and tablets, and we're expecting to see some robots and other gadgets too — plus plenty of AI news, of course. In addition to the announcements, MWC is our chance to get hands-on time with some of the most interesting new devices, like the Xiaomi 17 Ultra.Engadget’s Mat Smith is on the ground in Barcelona, and we'll be updating this story as the week goes on to keep you in t...

item.title: First Film to Depict a Robot Discovered in Michigan
item.description: Created in 1897, it's over two decades older than the term "robot."

item.title: Alaska could be the next state to crack down on AI-generated CSAM and restrict kids' social media use
item.description: Alaska's House of Representatives unanimously passed HB47, a bill that imposes sweeping limits on when and how minors use social media apps, along with bans on generating or distributing harmful deepfakes of children. The bill's original form was focused on prohibiting the possession and distribution of sexually explicit images of children using AI, but Alaska lawmakers decided to add amendments that would impose social media restrictions. The proposed limitations include a statewide curfew on using social media between 10:30 PM and 6:30 AM, banning "addictive design features" and requiring so...

item.title: Le rapport entre un Dacia Duster 4×4 et une Porsche, des grosses promos AUDI, et un alléchant VTC électrique Decathlon – Récap’ Survoltés
item.description: L’actualité Survoltés a été dense cette semaine, entre l'innovation technique du Dacia Duster 4x4, les tendances et régulation côté voitures électriques, et les nouveautés sur les vélos électriques et l’énergie. Voici le récapitulatif des articles les plus consultés cette semaine sur Survoltés.

item.title: I never thought I'd say this, but the Steam Machine might be done for before it even arrives — but one choice from Valve can save it from the RAM crisis
item.description: The Steam Machine might be in big trouble launching during the RAM crisis, but one controversial measure from Valve might save it.
